title: Interview with Linus Pauling
creator_credit: Joseph Koenig, Hugh O'Connor and ONF | NFB
brief_description: A stimulating and provocative hour with Dr. Linus Pauling, eminent American chemist and Nobel Prize winner in 1954 (Chemistry). A man of good humor, conviction and far-reaching enthusiasm, Dr. Pauling speaks in this film of his work in biochemistry, in which he is considered to be one of the world’s leading authorities, of his opposition to atomic explosions, and of his concern for the future of man.
